students_schemes.name: National Scholarship Portal (NSP)
students_schemes.criteria: Centralized platform for various government scholarships
students_schemes.description: Provides access to multiple government scholarships for students across India.

students_schemes.name: Central Sector Scheme of Scholarships for College and University Students
students_schemes.criteria: Students scoring ≥80% in Class 12 with family income ≤ ₹8 lakh/year
students_schemes.description: Scholarship of ₹10,000 per year for the first 3 years and ₹20,000 for the 4th and 5th years.

students_schemes.name: INSPIRE Scholarship for Higher Education (SHE)
students_schemes.criteria: Top 1% students in Class 12 pursuing BSc or Integrated MSc in natural sciences
students_schemes.description: Scholarship of ₹80,000 per year for higher education in natural sciences.

students_schemes.name: Post Matric and Pre-Matric Scholarships for SC/ST/OBC/Minority Students
students_schemes.criteria: Students belonging to SC/ST/OBC/Minority communities based on income and academic performance
students_schemes.description: Provides financial assistance for education through NSP.

students_schemes.name: Jagananna Vidya Deevena
students_schemes.criteria: Students from economically weaker sections in Andhra Pradesh
students_schemes.description: Full reimbursement of tuition, special, and examination fees.

students_schemes.name: Panasonic Ratti Chhatr Scholarship
students_schemes.criteria: IIT B.E./B.Tech students with ≥75% in Class 12 and family income ≤ ₹8 lakh/year
students_schemes.description: Scholarship of ₹70,250 per year for 4 years.

students_schemes.name: HDFC Educational Crisis Scholarship
students_schemes.criteria: Students facing financial crises from Class 6 to postgraduate level
students_schemes.description: Provides financial assistance depending on the level of study.

students_schemes.name: Infosys Foundation STEM Stars Scholarship
students_schemes.description: Scholarship support for female STEM students.

students_schemes.name: Foundation for Excellence (FFE) Scholarships
students_schemes.criteria: Academically gifted students from low-income families pursuing professional degrees
students_schemes.description: Scholarships to support higher education for talented students from low-income families.

students_schemes.name: Kotak Kanya Scholarship
students_schemes.criteria: Meritorious female students from underprivileged backgrounds

students_schemes.name: Azim Premji Scholarship
students_schemes.criteria: Class 12 passed girls from select regions enrolled in undergraduate courses
students_schemes.description: Provides ₹30,000 per year to support undergraduate studies.

students_schemes.name: Aakash National Talent Hunt Exam (ANTHE)
students_schemes.description: Provides up to 100% tuition fee waiver for Aakash coaching programs.

farmers_schemes.name: PM Dhan Dhanya Krishi Yojana
farmers_schemes.description: Enhances agricultural productivity, promotes crop diversification, improves irrigation, facilitates access to credit and storage.

farmers_schemes.name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC) – Enhanced Limit
farmers_schemes.criteria: Farmers including those in dairy and fisheries sectors
farmers_schemes.description: Provides short-term affordable loans with enhanced credit limit from ₹3 lakh to ₹5 lakh.

farmers_schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
farmers_schemes.description: Crop insurance covering losses due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases.

farmers_schemes.name: PM-KUSUM Scheme
farmers_schemes.description: Promotes solar energy with up to 90% subsidy for solar pumps and income generation from surplus solar energy.

farmers_schemes.name: Agri Infrastructure Fund
farmers_schemes.description: Offers medium- and long-term debt financing for post-harvest and community farming projects with credit guarantees.

farmers_schemes.name: Pulse Procurement Mission
farmers_schemes.description: Six-year initiative to procure pulses like tur, urad, and masoor through cooperatives to boost domestic production.

farmers_schemes.name: Makhana Board in Bihar
farmers_schemes.description: Establishes a board for improving makhana production, organizing FPOs, and providing training and government scheme access.

girls_schemes.name: PRAGATI Scholarship for Girl Students
girls_schemes.criteria: Girls admitted to the first year of a technical diploma or degree course
girls_schemes.description: Offers up to ₹50,000 per annum for tuition and other expenses.

girls_schemes.name: Post-Graduate Indira Gandhi Scholarship for Single Girl Child
girls_schemes.criteria: Single girl child pursuing postgraduate studies
girls_schemes.description: Provides ₹36,200 per annum for two years to support education.

girls_schemes.name: National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship Scheme (NMMSS)
girls_schemes.criteria: Students of Class IX to XII with parental income below ₹3.5 lakh per annum
girls_schemes.description: Provides ₹12,000 per annum to meritorious students.

girls_schemes.name: Kanyashree Prakalpa
girls_schemes.criteria: Unmarried girls aged 13–18 years enrolled in classes VIII–XII in West Bengal
girls_schemes.description: Provides ₹1,000 annually and a one-time ₹25,000 grant at 18 years of age.

girls_schemes.name: Azim Premji Scholarship
girls_schemes.criteria: Girls pursuing undergraduate courses in select regions
girls_schemes.description: Provides ₹30,000 per year for the duration of the undergraduate course.

girls_schemes.name: HDFC Educational Crisis Scholarship
girls_schemes.criteria: Students from Class 6 to postgraduate level facing personal or family crisis
girls_schemes.description: Provides up to ₹75,000 depending on the level of study.

girls_schemes.name: Adobe India Women-in-Technology Scholarship
girls_schemes.criteria: Female B.Tech or M.Tech students in computer science or related fields
girls_schemes.description: Provides ₹1,00,000 along with internship opportunities at Adobe India.

girls_schemes.name: Jai Krishna Girls Scholarship
girls_schemes.criteria: Girls pursuing undergraduate or postgraduate courses

boys_schemes.name: Tamizh Pudhalvan Scheme
boys_schemes.criteria: Male students studying in government or government-aided schools in Tamil Nadu (Classes 6 to 12)
boys_schemes.description: Provides ₹1,000 per month to support higher education.

boys_schemes.name: National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship (NMMSS)
boys_schemes.criteria: Students with family income below ₹4.5 lakh per annum
boys_schemes.description: Annual scholarship for meritorious students; 41,000 scholarships available for boys each year.

boys_schemes.name: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister’s Talent Search Examination (TNCMTSE)
boys_schemes.description: Scholarships awarded based on performance in the Talent Search Examination.

boys_schemes.name: Reliance Foundation Undergraduate Scholarships
boys_schemes.criteria: First-year undergraduate students across all streams
boys_schemes.description: Provides up to ₹2 lakh over the duration of the degree, based on merit-cum-means.

boys_schemes.name: Swami Dayanand Education Foundation Scholarships
boys_schemes.criteria: Students under 20 years entering the first year of college from government or aided schools

boys_schemes.name: Vidyadhan Scholarship by Sarojini Damodaran Foundation
boys_schemes.criteria: Students from government schools (Tamil Nadu and other states) who have passed 10th grade with family income below ₹2 lakh per annum
boys_schemes.description: Provides up to ₹6,000 per annum for students in classes 11 and 12.

sports_schemes.name: Khelo India Scholarship Scheme
sports_schemes.criteria: Young athletes selected under Khelo India Programme
sports_schemes.description: Provides ₹5 lakh per annum to 1,000 athletes for training, nutrition, equipment, and education.

sports_schemes.name: Sports Authority of India (SAI) Scholarships
sports_schemes.description: Offers scholarships for training, competition support, and sports development.

sports_schemes.name: National Sports Development Scholarships Examination (NSDSE)
sports_schemes.description: Awards scholarships from ₹3,000 to ₹25,000 based on performance in recognized sports events.

sports_schemes.name: ONGC Sports Scholarship
sports_schemes.criteria: Young athletes across various sports disciplines
sports_schemes.description: Supports 250 athletes annually with scholarships for training and development.

sports_schemes.name: IndianOil 'Acers' Sports Scholarship
sports_schemes.criteria: Budding sportspersons with 50% reserved for female athletes
sports_schemes.description: Scholarships for upcoming athletes; notable alumni include Manika Batra and Prithvi Shaw.

sports_schemes.name: Reliance Foundation Youth Sports (RFYS)
sports_schemes.description: Promotes youth sports by offering scholarships and training programs.

sports_schemes.name: Inspire Institute of Sport (IIS) by JSW
sports_schemes.criteria: High-potential athletes in athletics, boxing, judo, swimming, and wrestling
sports_schemes.description: Offers full scholarships at India's first privately-funded high-performance training center.

sports_schemes.name: Shivprabha Charitable Trust Sports Scholarships
sports_schemes.criteria: Athletes requiring financial support for training and competitions
sports_schemes.description: Provides financial assistance for both domestic and international participation.

sports_schemes.name: Virendra Kumar Dhall Scholarship at Loughborough University
sports_schemes.criteria: Indian athletes enrolled at Loughborough University competing internationally
sports_schemes.description: £12,500 scholarship for training, equipment, and competition participation expenses.

unemployment_schemes.name: Tamil Nadu Unemployment Assistance Scheme 2025
unemployment_schemes.criteria: Unemployed residents of Tamil Nadu registered for 5 years with District Employment Centres, below 40 years of age, family income < ₹72,000/year
unemployment_schemes.description: Monthly financial assistance based on education: SSLC Failed ₹200, SSLC Passed ₹300, HSC Passed ₹400, Graduates ₹600.

unemployment_schemes.name: District-Level Unemployment Scholarships
unemployment_schemes.criteria: Unemployed youth registered with district employment offices in Tamil Nadu
unemployment_schemes.description: Scholarships offered by districts like Salem, Kancheepuram, and Tiruppur to support unemployed youth.

unemployment_schemes.name: Berojgari Bhatta Yojna
unemployment_schemes.description: Financial assistance between ₹1,000 to ₹1,500 per month; also offers job listings.

unemployment_schemes.name: JK Tyre Shiksha Sarthi Scholarship Program
unemployment_schemes.criteria: Female students pursuing technical, non-technical undergraduate or diploma courses
unemployment_schemes.description: Scholarships up to ₹25,000 for technical courses and ₹15,000 for non-technical or diploma courses.

unemployment_schemes.name: Hakeem Abdul Hameed Scholarship
unemployment_schemes.criteria: Students from minority, SC, ST, OBC, and general categories with ≥50% in 12th and family income ≤ ₹3 lakh/year
unemployment_schemes.description: Financial aid for pursuing technical, professional, graduate, diploma, or vocational courses.

transgender_schemes.name: Free Higher Education for Transgender Students (Tamil Nadu)
transgender_schemes.criteria: Transgender individuals pursuing higher education in Tamil Nadu
transgender_schemes.description: Covers all education-related expenses including tuition and hostel fees under Transgender Welfare Board.

transgender_schemes.name: Monthly Scholarship for Transgender Students (Tamil Nadu)
transgender_schemes.description: ₹1,000 per month scholarship extended to transgender individuals.

transgender_schemes.name: Home Guard Induction (Tamil Nadu)
transgender_schemes.criteria: Transgender individuals interested in security forces
transgender_schemes.description: Induction into Home Guard with training and remuneration equal to other members.

transgender_schemes.name: Special Seed Fund for Startups by Transgender Individuals
transgender_schemes.criteria: Transgender and disabled individuals running startups
transgender_schemes.description: ₹50 lakh seed fund to support entrepreneurial ventures through StartupTN.

transgender_schemes.name: Tamil Nadu State-Level Transgender Award
transgender_schemes.criteria: Transgender individuals contributing to the community
transgender_schemes.description: Annual award presented on April 15 (Thirunangaiyar Day).

transgender_schemes.name: SMILE Scholarship Scheme
transgender_schemes.criteria: Transgender students from Class IX onwards
transgender_schemes.description: Scholarships for school, higher education, and vocational training to reduce dropout rates.

transgender_schemes.name: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank Transgender Scholarship
transgender_schemes.criteria: Transgender students in Classes 9–12 or pursuing graduation/postgraduation
transgender_schemes.description: Scholarship of up to ₹60,000 for academic support.

transgender_schemes.name: Legrand Empowering Scholarship Program
transgender_schemes.criteria: Meritorious girl, differently-abled, and transgender students pursuing higher education
transgender_schemes.description: Scholarship of up to ₹1,00,000 per year.

transgender_schemes.name: Jyoti Prakash Scholarship and Mentorship Program
transgender_schemes.criteria: Transgender, disabled, orphan, sportsperson, or single-parent students in Class 9–PG
transgender_schemes.description: ₹24,000 for academic/sports expenses plus mentorship support.

transgender_schemes.name: Sahodari Foundation Scholarships
transgender_schemes.description: Support for education, entrepreneurship, and skill-building programs.
